beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 90
beats.narration: Mile 90. First Sunset Transition. Sun sets around Mile 80-90 for faster riders. Transition to first overnight. Reality of 250+ miles ahead sinks in. Temperature drops.

beats.narration: Mile 165. Midnight Wind Tunnel. Deep into first overnight. Coldest temps. Wind still blowing. Navigation errors when tired. Lowest morale point.

beats.narration: Mile 245. The Void - Hour 35-40. Sleep deprivation peaks. Hallucinations possible. Questioning every life choice. Gas station stops become emotional lifelines. Mental survival mode.
